channel.title: Juggle Jugglers Phone Rock Insane Chris Juggling Matiss Amjad Holmes on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggle Jugglers Phone Rock Insane Chris Juggling Matiss Amjad Holmes on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: The disaster it could have been...
item.description: Last night was so dope. We, the J.O.D. juggled at chris holmes’ electro shw at te metro. it was sooo much fun. all my friends were there - and it was great to juggle with matt, matiss and brad. so much fun. here are pictures. The show was insane. first we started with some knife juggling while chris and aaron did their song.. then sparklemotion came out.. and did their thing.
